detectors.description:
BABA.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#43-56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#49)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#50)
detectors.markdown:
[BABA.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#L43-L56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#L49)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#L50)

detectors.description:
BABA.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#58-72) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#64)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#65)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#66)

	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#L65)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#L66)

detectors.description:
BABA.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#38-41) should emit an event for: 
	- valid = isValid (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#40)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#4)
	- BABA.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#24-26)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#5)
	- BABA.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#30-32)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#6)
	- BABA.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#34-36)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BABA.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#74-78)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#9)
	- BABA.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#43-56)

validate(uint8) should be declared external:
	- BABA.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BABA.sol#38-41)
